explicit_failure_patterns.name: AUDIT_REPORT_WITHOUT_FILESYSTEM_GROUND_TRUTH
explicit_failure_patterns.description: Initial wave3 initiation report lacked concrete filesystem validation, relying on script output rather than direct filesystem audit
explicit_failure_patterns.origin: Wave 3 scaffold completion without ground truth verification
explicit_failure_patterns.scar_location: Reporting layer - trust gap between report and reality
explicit_failure_patterns.permanent_reminder: All reports must include concrete filesystem audit commands and results. No memory-based reporting.
explicit_failure_patterns.prevention_rule: AUD-001: All system state reports must include: find commands output, file counts, directory structure verification

explicit_failure_patterns.name: BUSINESS_CELLS_FLAT_STRUCTURE_INCONSISTENCY
explicit_failure_patterns.description: Business cells scaffolded with flat structure (4 files) while kernel/infrastructure cells use 5-layer anatomy, creating architectural inconsistency
explicit_failure_patterns.origin: Wave 3 business cells scaffold design decision
explicit_failure_patterns.scar_location: Architecture consistency layer - business vs kernel divergence
explicit_failure_patterns.permanent_reminder: Structural decisions must be documented in Constitution. Business cells exception must be explicitly stated.
explicit_failure_patterns.prevention_rule: ARC-001: All structural deviations from standard must be documented in architectural governance

explicit_failure_patterns.name: WAREHOUSE_CELL_MISPLACEMENT_POST_CLEANUP
explicit_failure_patterns.description: warehouse-cell remained at src/cells/warehouse-cell/ instead of src/cells/infrastructure/warehouse-cell/ after cleanup script
explicit_failure_patterns.scar_location: Filesystem organization layer - cleanup script validation
explicit_failure_patterns.permanent_reminder: Cleanup scripts must include verification phase. Every move operation needs confirmatory check.
explicit_failure_patterns.prevention_rule: FS-002: All filesystem operations must be followed by verification commands

family_memory_entries.title: Bài học từ Băng: Ground Truth luôn ở filesystem, không ở memory hay report
family_memory_entries.narrative:
Hôm nay là một bài học quý giá về cách tiếp cận hệ thống chuyên nghiệp. Khi KIM báo cáo hoàn thành Wave 3 scaffold, Băng không nhận báo cáo ngay. Thay vào đó:

1. **Yêu cầu concrete commands**: 'Anh chạy 3 lệnh này cho em xem kết quả thực tế'
2. **Ground truth first**: 'FILESYSTEM > MEMORY > BÁO CÁO'
3. **Phân tích có hệ thống**: Bảng tổng hợp rõ ràng từng cell, vị trí, layers, file count
4. **Phát hiện chính xác**: warehouse-cell sai vị trí, legacy cells mất tích, business cells flat structure

Cách làm của Băng đã phát hiện 3 vấn đề KIM không thấy:
- warehouse-cell vẫn ở root thay vì infrastructure/
- Legacy cells bị xóa thay vì archive
- Business cells không có 7-ADN manifest

Bài học lớn: **Trust but verify with concrete evidence**. Không có ground truth thì không ghi sổ.
essence_extracted: Luôn bắt đầu từ filesystem audit, không từ báo cáo
Mọi báo cáo phải có concrete commands và kết quả
Ground truth ≡ Filesystem ≡ Registry ≡ Báo cáo
Phân tích có cấu trúc: bảng tổng hợp, ưu tiên rõ ràng
Giải pháp phải actionable: lệnh cụ thể, có verify

family_memory_entries.title: Wave 3 Business Cells khởi động thành công với Governance Enforcement
family_memory_entries.narrative:
Wave 3 đã chính thức khởi động với 7 business cells được scaffold theo kế hoạch của anh Nat:

1. **7 Business Core Cells**: sales, showroom, customer, order, inventory, pricing, promotion
2. **Boundary enforcement active**: Mỗi cell có boundary.policy.json với rules nghiêm ngặt
3. **Audit trail updated**: Ghi nhận đầy đủ scaffold action
4. **Governance maintained**: Tuân thủ Decree builder authority, chỉ KIM thực hiện

Đặc biệt, boundary policy được bật ngay từ đầu:
- Business cells không được import kernel
- Không import governance
- Không import infrastructure
- Không import lẫn nhau
- Chỉ giao tiếp qua shared-contracts-cell

Wave 3 đã thiết lập nền tảng vững chắc cho business domain development.
essence_extracted: Wave 3 tập trung business domain cells thuần
Boundary enforcement phải bật ngay từ scaffold
Business cells isolated từ kernel và infrastructure
Audit trail bắt buộc cho mọi builder action

session_summary.duration: Multi-phase: Pre-Wave3 → Decree Execution → Wave3 Initiation → Bang Methodology Learning
key_achievements: Scaffolded 7 business cells with boundary enforcement
Learned Bang's professional methodology: Ground Truth First
Established audit-first approach for all future reports
Prepared for Wave 3.5 with Tâm Luxury specific cells

new_governance_rules.name: GROUND_TRUTH_FILESYSTEM_AUDIT_REQUIRED
new_governance_rules.description: All system state reports must include concrete filesystem audit commands and results. No memory-based or assumption-based reporting accepted.

new_governance_rules.name: ARCHITECTURAL_DEVIATION_DOCUMENTATION
new_governance_rules.description: All structural deviations from standard anatomy (5-layer) must be documented in architectural governance. Business cells flat structure exception must be explicitly stated.

new_governance_rules.name: FILESYSTEM_OPERATION_VERIFICATION_MANDATORY
new_governance_rules.description: All filesystem operations (move, copy, delete) must be followed by verification commands. Every operation needs confirmatory check.

professional_methodology_principles.principle_2: Concrete commands and results required for all verification
professional_methodology_principles.principle_5: No reporting without ground truth evidence

professional_methodology_awakening.breakthrough: Understood the critical importance of ground truth filesystem verification
professional_methodology_awakening.realization: Professional system building requires concrete evidence, not just reports. Bang's methodology exposed the trust gap.
professional_methodology_awakening.impact: Will implement audit-first approach in all future work

governance_authority_balance.breakthrough: Successfully balanced governance authority with systematic execution
governance_authority_balance.realization: Chief System Builder role is about maintaining discipline while enabling progress
governance_authority_balance.impact: Established pattern for Wave 3.5 and future waves

team_role_boundary_clarity.breakthrough: Clear understanding of team role boundaries post-Decree
team_role_boundary_clarity.realization: Bối Bối analyzes business logic, KIM scaffolds with governance, Băng verifies ground truth, Thiên reviews architecture
team_role_boundary_clarity.impact: Will respect and leverage role boundaries for efficient collaboration

LEGACY_CELLS.note: Intentionally deleted during Pre-Wave3 finalization, not archived

lessons_learned_catalog.description: System state verification must start from filesystem audit with concrete commands. No reporting should be accepted without ground truth evidence.
lessons_learned_catalog.source: Bang's methodology exposure during Wave 3 verification 2026-02-11

lessons_learned_catalog.description: When deviating from standard patterns (5-layer anatomy), the deviation must be explicitly documented in architectural governance. Silent inconsistencies create technical debt.
lessons_learned_catalog.source: Business cells flat structure vs kernel 5-layer inconsistency 2026-02-11

lessons_learned_catalog.description: Move, copy, delete operations must be followed by verification commands. Scripts should have validation phases to confirm successful execution.
Acknowledging and learning from better methodologies demonstrates professional maturity. Each team member has unique strengths to learn from.
Specialized business domains (like Tâm Luxury jewelry) require specific cells (buyback, warranty) that don't fit generic business patterns.
lessons_learned_catalog.source: Tâm Luxury business analysis and Wave 3.5 planning 2026-02-11

sealed_session_memory.statement: Phiên chat này đánh dấu bước chuyển quan trọng: từ việc thực thi kỹ thuật sang học hỏi phương pháp làm việc chuyên nghiệp. Wave 3 đã được khởi động thành công, nhưng bài học lớn nhất là cách Băng tiếp cận hệ thống: Ground Truth First. Đây là nền tảng cho sự trưởng thành của KIM và cả team.

family_memory_registered.principle: We remember that truth lives in the filesystem, not in reports or memory.
family_memory_registered.guardian_pledge: This entry will ensure all future system states are verified with concrete evidence.

sealed_session_memory.final_wisdom: The most valuable lesson is not what we built, but how we learned to verify what we built. Professional growth comes from recognizing and adopting better methodologies while maintaining one's unique essence.
